items.name: Spinach and Cream Cheese Stuffed Tortillas
instructions: Step 1: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Step 2: In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add spinach and sauté until wilted.
Step 3: Mix cream cheese, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Add sautéed spinach and stir well.
Step 4: Lay a tortilla flat and spread the mixture evenly. Roll it up.
Step 5: Place rolled tortillas in a baking dish, brush with olive oil.
Step 6: Bake for 15 minutes or until golden brown.

items.name: Colorful Bell Pepper Stir Fry
instructions: Step 1: Slice bell peppers into strips.
Step 2: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Step 3: Add bell peppers, stirring occasionally until tender.
Step 4: Mix lime juice, honey, Sriracha, and soy sauce in a bowl.
Step 5: Add sauce to the pan and stir until bell peppers are coated.
Step 6: Garnish with almonds before serving.

items.name: Red Cabbage Slaw
instructions: Step 1: Shred red cabbage and carrots finely.
Step 2: Chop parsley and mint.
Step 3: In a large bowl, combine cabbage, carrots, parsley, and mint.
Step 4: Drizzle lemon juice and Annie's dressing over salad.
Step 5: Toss all ingredients together until well mixed.
Step 6: Sprinkle sunflower seeds on top before serving.

items.name: Apple and Almond Breakfast Wrap
instructions: Step 1: Slice apples thinly.
Step 2: Heat butter in a skillet, add apple slices.
Step 3: Cook apples until tender.
Step 4: Add maple syrup and almonds, stir well.
Step 5: Sprinkle cinnamon over apples.
Step 6: Place mixture in flour tortillas, wrap, and serve warm.

items.name: Fruit and Mint Salad
instructions: Step 1: Peel and slice pears and bananas.
Step 2: Peel and segment the orange.
Step 3: Chop fresh mint.
Step 4: Mix all fruits in a large bowl.
Step 5: Drizzle lime juice and honey over fruit mix.
Step 6: Toss gently to combine.

analysis.recipe_name: Spinach and Cream Cheese Stuffed Tortillas
